definition: net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body

sentences.english: The AS-I interface network layer was used to carry out the interconnection communication between sensor and executor.
sentences.chinese: 接口网络层用于传感器和执行器的联网通信。

sentences.english: Controlling routing at the physical network layer embeds policy into topology.
sentences.chinese: 在物理网络层控制路由需要将策略嵌入到拓扑中。

sentences.english: The architecture of this module consists of Auto-adaptive Ontology Layer and CBR Layer.
sentences.chinese: 本模型包括自适应本体网络层和CBR领域知识层。

sentences.english: You can think of this as creating a secure trusted tunnel at the network layer.
sentences.chinese: 您可以将这看作是在网络层创建安全的受信任隧道。

sentences.english: Another approach to monitoring is to listen at the network level.
sentences.chinese: 另外一种监控方法是在网络层监听。

sentences.english: A packet-filtering firewall works at the network level.
sentences.chinese: 信息包过滤防火墙工作在网络层。

sentences.english: The IP layer provides a connectionless and unreliable delivery system.
sentences.chinese: 在网络层提供了无连接的不可靠传输系统。

sentences.english: Above the link layer is the network layer, which is responsible for directing packets to their destinations.
sentences.chinese: 链路层上面是网络层，它负责将报文定向到目标位置。

sentences.english: In particular, it pro-vides the implement mechanism for the network layer's secure transport tunnel technology.
sentences.chinese: 特别是对网络层的安全传输通道技术提出了实现机制。

sentences.english: Think of this as creating a secure trusted tunnel at the network layer.
sentences.chinese: 可以将这看作是在网络层上创建安全的可信隧道。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
